generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with yellow pedestrian crossing markings and lane lines, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A raised, paved area with a curb on the right side, adjacent to the road, is visible, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: A structure with windows and a roof is visible on the left side of the image, which is a building.
- wall: A low, possibly concrete wall with graffiti is visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- fence: A metal railing with vertical bars is visible along the left side of the road, which is a fence.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including one supporting a traffic sign and others holding streetlights.
- traffic sign: A blue and white sign with a pedestrian symbol is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Dark silhouettes of trees or bushes are visible along the sides of the road, particularly on the left and right.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a dark sky with streetlights and overhead wires.
- person: A person is visible standing near the wall on the right side of the road.
- car: A white car with red taillights is visible in the distance, driving on the road.
- bus: A yellow and black articulated bus is visible on the left side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
- train: No train is visible in the image.
- truck: No truck is visible in the image.
